pharmacy.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a shop or a part of a shop where medicines are prepared and sold
pharmacy.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the place where medicines are prepared in a hospital
pharmacy.translation[0].definitions[2].d: the study or practice of preparing drugs and medicines
